com.github.dylon.liblevenshtein.levenshtein

Interface IDistance<Term>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMemoized, MemoizedMergeAndSplit, MemoizedStandard, MemoizedTransposition

    public interface IDistance<Term>
    Specifies the interface that all distance functions must implement.
    Since:
    2.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int between(Term v, Term w)
      Finds the distance between two terms, v and w.

    • Method Detail

      • between

        int between(Term v,
            Term w)
        Finds the distance between two terms, v and w. The distance between two terms is complemented by their similarity, which is determined by subtracting their distance from the maximum distance they may be apart.
        Parameters:
        v - Term to compare with w
        w - Term to compare with v
        Returns:
        Distance between v and w
